articles.title: General Kim Jong Il revered as god
articles.content:
General Kim Jong Il revered as god
   Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNAkcna) - Secretary Kim Jong Il is trusted absolutely, eternally and fully as if he were god, says a political essay carried in Rodong Sinmun Saturday.
   The authors of the essay titled "General Kim Jong Il revered as god" stress among other things:
   Absolute trust in General is a strong support for our socialist motherland, mental pabulum for our people's revolutionary faith and the most powerful weapon to defeat any formidable enemy.
   This trust is the source of all our struggle and life, the Korean way and principle of life and a philosophy of eternal victory of the Korean revolution.
   The Korean people regard him as their god because he defends the destiny of the motherland, nation and people.
   He is the great sun for our life, so we follow him, entrusting our life, future and everything to him.
   The Juche cause is our lifeblood and lifelong mission.
   When we uphold this cause, we live and if not, we die. 
   That is why we trust and follow General Kim Jong Il, the great successor to the Juche cause and the leader of the people.
   The Korean people are determined to uphold their leader and share weal and woe with him for all ages.
   As we believe in him as in god, we will win forever.

articles.title: Letter to Marshal Kim Jong Il from Chongryon CSC
articles.content:
Letter to Secretary Kim Jong Il from Chongryon CSC
   Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) - Secretary Kim Jong Il received a letter of loyalty  from the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) today on the occasion of his 55th birthday.
   General Kim Jong Il, who was born as the bright star of the Juche cause and humankind in the spirit of Mt. Paektu, has performed immortal feats for the country and the nation, the era and humankind, breaking a new ground of loving care for the people with highest loyalty to the leader and the party, the letter says, and goes on:
   A genius of creation and construction, you have cemented the political, economic and military positions of socialism with your distinguished leadership, pulling through manifold obstacles and difficulties, turned adversity into favourable conditions, misfortune into blessings at all times in the acute political and military confrontation with the enemies, and thus won great victories.
   You have constantly developed in depth the Juche-based ideas and theories on the overseas compatriots' movement. 
   You sent us a historic letter, indicating how we should build up Chongryon into an overseas compatriots' organisation of Generalissimo Kim Il Sung and develop the movement of Koreans in Japan onto a new higher stage.
   We will hold the Generalissimo in high esteem for all ages, remain loyal to you,  firmly defend you and more deeply cherish confidence in the socialist motherland of Juche and the patriotic cause of Chongryon under your leadership.

articles.title: Congratulations to Secy. Kim Jong Il from NDFSK
articles.content:
Congratulations to Secy. Kim Jong Il from NDFSK
   Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- Secretary Kim Jong Il received a congratulatory message from the Central Committee of the National Democratic Front of South Korea (NDFSK) today on his 55th birthday.
   The message says in part:
   General Kim Jong Il, your birth as the great son of Mt. Paektu was a sunrise that enabled the Korean nation to be blessed with great men generation after generation and live in happiness forever as the sun's nation and a great event in human history that declared the appearance of a great man who will be immortal with the Juche era.
   You are the great successor to the Juche cause and a great political leader who has wisely led the revolution and construction as demanded by Kimilsungism and wrought world-startling miracles.
   Led by you, North Korea is famous as a powerful state in politics based on the singlehearted unity of the leader, the party and the masses and a powerful socialist state of Juche where people cherish confidence in their socialism in any adversity.
   Progressive people have elected you as the leader of the 21st century and wholly entrust you with the destiny of the cause of socialism and independence. This is the main trend of the present time and inevitable development of history no one can block.
   Your leadership also reaches the NDFSK and the southern people, so they worship you as the savior of their destiny and the lodestar of national reunification and courageously promote the noble revolutionary movement in South Korea.

articles.title: Comgratulations to Secy. Kim Jong Il from foreigners in Korea
articles.content:
Congratulations to Secy. Kim Jong Il from foreigners in Korea
    Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- Secretary Kim Jong Il received floral baskets, gifts and congratulatory letters from foreign diplomatic envoys and embassies in Pyongyang on his birthday.
   They included diplomatic envoys of China, Cambodia, Viet Nam, Laos, Iran, Indonesia, India, Yemen, Ethiopia, Mongolia, Egypt, Russia, Bulgaria, Yugoslavia, Nigeria, Hungary, Romania, Poland, Cuba, Libya, Syria, Palestine and Sweden, the resident representative of the UNDP, the acting head of the German interests section, the commercial councillor of the Polish embassy, military attaches of Egyptian, Iranian, Russian, Cuban and Vietnamese embassies and cultural officials of different embassies in Pyongyang.

articles.title: Joint National meeting of KCU orgs.
articles.content:
Joint national meeting of KCU orgs.
   Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- A joint national meeting of the Korean Children's Union organizations took place at the Pyongyang Indoor Stadium on Sunday to celebrate the 55th birthday of General Kim Jong Il.
   Present there were provincial delegates of the KCU, schoolchildren in Pyongyang, educational workers, officials of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League, anti-Japanese revolutionary veterans, heroes, people of meritorious services, soldiers of the Korean People's Army and parents of schoolchildren.
   Vice-President Pak Song Chol and Minister of the People's Armed Forces Choe Kwang, who are politburo members of  the Workers' Party of Korea Central Committee, and other senior party and state officials were also on hand.
   A KCU ceremony was held at the meeting.
   Flags bearing portraits of President Kim Il Sung and General Kim Jong Il entered the meeting place.
   Choe Ryong Hae, First Secretary of the Central Committee of the Youth League, in his report said that the KCU members Should become loyal and filial sons and daughters of General Kim Jong Il, convinced that he is their happiness and destiny.
   Then, followed a ceremony for new members of the KCU.
   Senior party and state officials, anti-Japanese revolutionary veterans, heroes, people of meritorious services and KPA soldiers fastened red ties round necks of children and put KCU badges on their chests after they took an oath for admission.

articles.title: Provincial committee gives party
articles.content:
Provincial committee gives party
   Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- The North Hamgyong Provincial Administrative and Economic Committee gave a party on Saturday on the occasion of the birthday of General Kim Jong Il.
   Invited to the party were consuls general and consular officials of china and Russia in Chongjin. 
   Present there were Kim Chung Il, chairman of the provincial committee, and other officials concerned.

articles.title: Mass gymnastic display held
articles.content:
Mass gymnastic display held
   Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- "Korea, I will glorify you," a mass gymnastic display of 10,000 students and pupils in Pyongyang, was held at the Pyongyang Indoor Stadium today to mark the 55th birthday of General Kim Jong Il.
   The display represented the immortal revolutionary exploits performed by General Kim Jong Il, true to his pledge to be responsible for the Korean revolution.
   Vice-presidents Ri Jong Ok, Pak Song Chol and Kim Pyong Sik, other senior party and state officials, soldiers of the Korean People's Army, working people, students and pupils in the city saw the display.
   Diplomatic envoys, foreign visitors, overseas Koreans and congratulatory groups and delegations of Korean nationals from abroad were also present.
   The display demonstrated the iron will and indomitable spirit of the Korean people to defend the headquarters of the Korean revolution with their lives and staunchly fight for the prosperity of Kim Il Sung's Korea and new victory in the revolution under the leadership of the Workers' Party of Korea.
   The display was warmly acclaimed by the spectators for its high ideological and artistic value, tested skills, organisation and discipline.

articles.title: Gift and floral baskets to Secy. Kim Jong Il from foreign Party and state leaders
articles.content:
Gift and floral baskets to Secy. Kim Jong Il from foreign party and state leaders
   Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) - Secretary Kim Jong Il received a gift from Ugandan President Yoweri Kaguta Museveni and floral baskets from General Secretary of the Communist Party of Viet Nam Central Committee Do Muoi and General Secretary of the National Democratic Congress of Ghana Huudu Yahaya on his 55th birthday.

articles.title: Message of greetings to Secy. Kim Jong Il from communist Party of China
articles.content:
Message of greetings to Secy. Kim Jong Il from Communist Party of China
   Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) - Secretary  Kim Jong Il on Feb. 15 received a message of greetings from the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China on his 55th birthday.
   The message warmly and sincerely congratulated him on behalf of the communist party and people of China and expressed the belief that the Workers' Party and people of Korea would build up korea into a prosperous socialist state through their arduous efforts under the leadership of the WPK Central Committee headed by General Kim Jong Il.
   The message went on:
   "You have greatly valued and paid attention to traditional Sino-Korean friendship for a long time and positively contributed to strengthening this friendship. 
   "We firmly believe that the Sino-Korean friendship and cooperation will further develop by the joint efforts of both sides under the care of the leaders of the two parties and states." 
   The message wished him good health and a long life and new success in his noble work for socialist construction and the independent and peaceful reunification of korea through his leadership over the WPK and the Korean people.

articles.title: Secy. Kim Jong Il sends educational aid fund and stipends to Chongryon
articles.content:
Secy. Kim Jong Il sends educational aid fund and stipends to Chongryon
   Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- Secretary Kim Jong Il sent educational aid fund and stipends amounting to 124 million yen (in Japanese currency) to the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) for its democratic and national education. 
   President Kim Il Sung and General Kim Jong Il have sent educational aid fund and stipends for children of compatriots in Japan totaling 43,049,532,433 yen in 136 instalments.
   The remittance of fund this time will greatly inspire the patriotic work of compatriots in Japan and contribute to the development of democratic and national education of Chongryon.

articles.title: Evening of servicemen
articles.content:
Evening of servicemen
    Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- An evening was sponsored at Jonsung square on February 15 by the Ministry of the People's Armed Forces on the 55th birthday of General Kim Jong Il, Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army.
   The square was decorated with celebration materials and crowded with soldiers of the three services of the Korean People's Army.
   With the "Song of General Kim Il Sung" and "Song of the Dear Comrade Kim Jong Il" the evening began. 
   Senior officials of the Ministry, generals and officers as well as soldiers danced to the tune of "Song of Three Prides", "March of Guerrillas" and other songs.
    The sky of the square was bright with a display of firecrackers.
    The participants enjoyed the evening as soldiers of the respected Supreme Commander, who has displayed the dignity of Kim Il Sung's Korea with courage and spirit as a famous commander and created  new legends of love for soldiers.

articles.title: Art performances mark Holiday
articles.content:
Art performances mark holiday
   Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- A performance of artists of the Korean People's Army song and dance ensemble and the "Bright Kim Jong Il Era" performance of the Mansudae Art Troupe were held in Pyongyang on Saturday on the occasion of the 55th birthday of General Kim Jong Il.
   Typical pieces were men's chorus "Health to Supreme Commander", dance "To Defend Headquarters" and female folk solo "When We Follow Him". 
   The performers sang of the greatness of General Kim Jong Il and the firm confidence and pledge of the Korean people to exalt the prosperous Workers' Party era under his leadership.
   Overseas Koreans visiting the socialist fatherland, a congratulatory group of the central committee of the National Democratic Front of South Korea, diplomatic envoys and embassy officials in Pyongyang also were present.

articles.title: Papers observe Secy. Kim Jong Il's birthday
articles.content:
Papers observe Secy. Kim Jong Il's birthday
   Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- Today marks the 55th birthday of Secretary Kim Jong Il.
   Papers here today edit news of celebrations at home and abroad.
   Figuring large in papers are a congratulatory message to Secretary Kim Jong Il from the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, the WPK Central Military Commission, the Central People's Committee of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, the Administration Council, a congratulatory message from the central committee of the National Democratic Front of South Korea and a letter from the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan. 
   It is reported that Secretary Kim Jong Il sent educational aid fund and stipends for children of compatriots in Japan on the occasion of the holiday of February.
   Papers carry messages of greetings to Secretary Kim Jong Il from Fidel Castro Ruz, First Secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Cuba, President of the Council of State and President of the Council of Ministers of the Republic of Cuba, and the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China, and gifts, floral baskets and congratulatory letters from the Ugandan President, party leaders of Viet Nam and Ghana, diplomatic envoys and embassy officials in Pyongyang and cultural officials of embassies.
   Printed in papers is a congratulatory message to Secretary Kim Jong Il from the Cleveland city, Ohio, assembly of the U.S.

articles.title: First performance of Korean artistes from Japan
articles.content:
First performance of Korean artistes from Japan
    Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- "General Kim Jong Il is life of 700,000 Koreans in Japan", the first performance of the art troupe of Koreans in Japan, was held in Pyongyang on Feb. 15 to celebrate the 55th birthday of General Kim Jong Il.
   The progamme included chorus, dance and female duet. 
   It showed that the Koreans in Japan feel reassured as they are led by the General, a great man of the century and  brilliant commander who defends the destiny of the country and nation and leads the cause of socialism to victory.
   It also depicted their ardent longing for President Kim Il Sung and their firm resolution  to remain loyal and devoted to General Kim Jong Il.
   Vice-Premier and Minister of Culture and Art Jang Chol, officials concerned and Pyongyangites saw the performance.

articles.title: Paper calls for accomplishing Korean revolution with mightof great harmonious whole
articles.content:
Paper calls for accomplishing Korean revolution with might
of great harmonious whole
   Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun today in an editorial dedicated to the 55th birthday of General Kim Jong Il stresses the need to accomplish the cause of the Korean revolution with the might of the great harmonious whole.
   In our harmonious whole, the leader and the people have the same ideology and intention and fight in unity,  the editorial says, and notes.
   We have nothing impossible to do because of the invincible harmonious whole in which the distinguished organizational ability of the leader and the inexhaustible strength of the people are united as one. 
   Our harmonious whole, in which the whole society has become the same family with General Kim Jong Il as the father, will be futher consolidated and developed with eternal viability no matter how many generations of revolution may alternate and how much time may flow.
   Our large family in which the leader and the people become the same family can never be dispersed and separated no matter what difficulties may lie in our way.
   The key to victory in the struggle to defend the Korean-style socialism from the challenges of the imperialists is the harmonious whole of the leader and the people.    It is the leader's belief and the people's trust that are stronger than nuclear weapons in the world.
   It is the revolutionary stamina of the Korean people to decisively smash the Brigandish strategy of the imperialists with the strategy of our singlehearted unity and the philosophy of trust.
   As long as there are the wise guidance of General Kim Jong Il and the great people remaining loyal to him, we can shatter any challenges of the imperialists and defend and exalt the Korean-style socialism to the end.
   The future of the Korean revolution is boundlessly bright and the integral whole of the leader, the party and the masses grows stronger as the days go by. 
   The Korean people will advance and struggle toward the final victory, full of conviction and optimism, singing the song of General Kim Jong Il in their hearts.

articles.title: Letters to Secy. Kim Jong Il conveyed
articles.content:
Letters to Secy. Kim Jong Il conveyed
   Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- A ceremony for presenting letters of loyalty to General Kim Jong Il took place today at the Pyongyang Indoor Stadium on the occasion of his birthday.
   Relay groups ran in and lined up in the stadium crowded with working people of all strata, soldiers of the Korean People's Army, youth and students.
   Letters of the people of each province, men and officers of the Korean People's Army, public security men, rail workers, officials of the commissions and ministries of the Administration Council and central state organs,  youth and children and the letter of the 700,000 Koreans in Japan to General Kim Jong Il were handed to politburo members and secretaries of the WPK Central Committee.
